title: A golden chaine of divine aphorismes written by John Gerhard Doctor of Divinitie and superintendent of Heldburg. Translated by Ralph Winterton fellow of Kings Colledge in Cambridge
author: Gerhard, Johann, 1582-1637.
publisher: Printed [for Richard Royston, London] by [Thomas Buck and Roger Daniel] the printers to the Vniversitie,
notes: With an added title page, engraved, "The marrow of diuinitie or A golden chaine of diuine sentenses .. London printed for Ri. Royston in Ivie-lane 1632" (the date changed in pen to 1633), signed "T. Cecill sculp.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
